interface/ESRingBuffer.h

00001 #ifndef ES_RING_BUFFER_H
00002 #define ES_RING_BUFFER_H
00003 // should really write as a template...
00004 /*
00005   A ring buffer for the Storage Manager Event Server
00006   Serialized events are stored (EventMsg). The size of the
00007   buffer can be given in the constructor but the max size
00008   of each event is hardwired to 7MB (actually 7000000).
00009     This is used by the Storage Manager FragmentCollector.
00010   When the ring buffer is full it the oldest event gets
00011   overwritten.
00012 
00013   30 Mar 2006 - HWKC - First implementation.
00014 */
00015 
00016 #include "IOPool/Streamer/interface/Messages.h"
00017 
00018 #include <vector>
00019 
00020 // fix max size of event in each ring buffer element
00021 #define MAX_EVTBUF_SIZE 7000000
00022 
00023 namespace stor
00024 {
00025   class ESRingBuffer
00026   {
00027     public:
00028     typedef std::vector<unsigned char> Buffer;
00029 
00030     ESRingBuffer(unsigned int size);
00031     virtual ~ESRingBuffer(){};
00032 
00033     edm::EventMsg pop_front();
00034     void push_back(edm::EventMsg msg);
00035     bool isEmpty();
00036     bool isFull();
00037 
00038     private:
00039     unsigned int maxsize_;  // max number of event slots in buffer
00040     int head_;       // next event to come off
00041     int tail_;       // last event put in
00042     int nextfree_;   // next free slot to fill in
00043     std::vector<Buffer> ring_buffer_; 
00044     std::vector<int> ring_totmsgsize_;
00045   };
00046 } // end namespace stor
00047 
00048 #endif
